formatted_address: 80 Marine Parade Road #05-01, Parkway Parade, Singapore 449269
name: SKN MediAesthetics (Parkway Parade)

reviews.text:
I recently visited SKN for a skincare treatment, and I couldn’t be more impressed. From the moment I walked in, the staff - June was warm and welcoming, creating a relaxing atmosphere. The facility was spotless and well-organized, which immediately put me at ease.

During my consultation, June took the time to understand my concerns and tailored a treatment plan specifically for me. Her expertise and attention to detail made me feel confident in the process. The treatment itself was comfortable, and I appreciated the follow-up care instructions provided.

After just a few sessions, I noticed a remarkable improvement in my skin. I’ve received countless compliments and feel more confident than ever. I highly recommend June from SKN to anyone looking for professional and effective beauty treatments. I will definitely be returning!

I have been visiting SKN for 2 years now, and my face feels rejuvenated after every visit. I want to give a special thanks to June, who was incredibly attentive and dedicated throughout the process. Her expertise and care made all the difference, and I truly appreciated her focus on my needs. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for professional and effective aesthetic treatments!

Extremely rude staff on the phone. I said my name and i asked “how may i address you?” And she just said “you want to speak to who??” And slammed the phone on me. Hope the management takes care of this.
